choices: Ignore him and stay with the girls
111.content:
" ... Is he dead?.....now what?" the world is black and you can hear a voice going in and out in the distance. "... Yea, well he is breathing maybe we should..." suddenly you feel cold water and you sit up quickly, your eyes snap open and you can't help but gasp from the surprise of the water. Two girls jump away from you in surprise, one of the girls is holding a now empty bucket. She nudges the other girl still staring at you. " whoa, maybe we should have done that sooner." the other girl responds but you don't listen because then you feel a headache growing rapidly, you rub you temples and look around. " what.. What happened? Who are you And why the bucket of water?" the two girls look at each other and the one without the bucket scratches her head. " umm, we don't know, we were just walking through when we saw your twin hop up and go sprinting north. The bucket was because you've been out for about an hour since we found you." you look back and forth at the two girls confused. " Twin? I don't have a twin. Are you sure?" Now its the girls' turn to look confused. " We know what we saw and you two are identical." you are about to protest but you think about the strange things that have been happening to you recently.

Do you trust them and chase after your " twin" or do you ignore that and explain to the girls what happened?
111.title: Good side

choices: Stay and explain to the boys
Ask the boys to help you find her
12.content:

Yea, well she's breathing maybe we should..." suddenly you feel cold water and you sit up quickly, your eyes snap open and you can't help but gasp from the surprise of the water. Two boys jump away from you in surprise, one of the boys is holding a now empty bucket. He nudges the other boy still staring at you. " whoa, maybe we should have done that sooner." the other boy responds but you don't listen because then you feel a headache growing rapidly, you rub you temples and look around. " what.. What happened? Who are you And why the bucket of water?" the two boys look at each other and the one without the bucket scratches his head. " umm, we don't know, we were just walking through when we saw your twin hop up and go sprinting north. The bucket was because you've been out for about an hour since we found you." you look back and forth at the two boys confused. " Twin? I don't have a twin. Are you sure?" Now its the boys' turn to look confused. " We know what we saw and you two are identical." you are about to protest but you think about the strange things that have been happening to you recently.

Do you trust them and chase after your " twin" or do you ignore that and explain to the boys what happened?
12.title: Girl

info.brief_description: What would happen if your personalities split in half and made two of you?
info.description:
What if you unwittingly became a part of a secret experiment and you split into two. Are you the good or bad half? Are you the original person or the part who was exstracted from the original? Which path will you take and who will you be?

No cursing/ cussing

Can't kill the other side of you... Yet

Have fun!
info.pretty_title: It's either you or.. You?! ( what if..)
